content.text:
# 1986 Dora Mavor Moore Awards

The 1986 Dora Mavor Moore Awards celebrated excellence in theatre from the Toronto Alliance for the Performing Arts.
Winners and nominees
General Theatre Division
{| class=wikitable style="width="100%"
|-
!width="50%" |Production
!width="50%" |Original Play
|-
| valign="top" |

**Farther West – Tarragon Theatre
**Ghetto – Toronto Workshop Productions
**Hosanna – Théâtre du Petit Bonheur
**The Miracle Worker – Young People's Theatre
| valign="top" |

**Islands by Margaret Hollingsworth – New Play Centre
**La Storia: A Table of Fables by Maristella Roca – Acting Company
**Papers by Allan Stratton – Tarragon Theatre
**The Wedding Script by Don Hannah – Tarragon Theatre
